references: Related: CF 247325; Amends: Ord 82436; Supersedes: Ord 16045
summary: An ordinance relating to the Lighting Dept.; providing for the crediting to the Light Fund of deposits made under Sections 15 & 25 of Ordinance 82436 and for the transferring to said Fund of such deposits now in the Guaranty Deposit Fund; amending said sections accordingly; and superseding Ordinance 16045 to the extent inconsistent.
